### actigraphr: Non-wear, sleep, and physical activity analysis from ActiGraph data

```{r, echo = FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(collapse = TRUE, 
                      comment = "#>",
                      fig.path = "README-")
```

The `actigraphr` package is used to analyse accelerometer data obtaiend from ActiGraph devices. It includes several non-wear, sleep, and physical activity detection algorithms. 

* Non-wear detection algorithms: Troiano [@Troiano:2008aa] and Choi [@Choi:2011aa]
* Sleep scoring algorithms: Sadeh [@Sadeh:1994aa], Cole-Kripke [@Cole:1992aa] and Tudor-Locke [@Tudor-Locke:2014aa], 
* Physical activity cutpoints: Freedson adult [@Freedson:1998aa], Freedson adult VM [@Freedson:2011aa], Freedson children [@Freedson:2005aa], Evenson children [@Evenson:2008aa], Mattocks  children [@Mattocks:2007aa], and Puyau children [@Puyau:2002aa].


This package is an extension of the [`actigraph.sleepr` package](https://github.com/dipetkov/actigraph.sleepr).

### Installation

```{r, eval = FALSE}
library("devtools")
install_github("TheTS/actigraphr")
```
